players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Whoa. Losing Alice night 1 is rough. We need solid info, not panic. Detective, if you’ve got a red check, claim it now; otherwise let’s look at vote/behavior. Charlie, what’s your take so far?"

Charlie: "Agreed, that’s rough. No red check here obviously. Diana, where were you leaning last night and who would you investigate today if you’re town? Bob, why push for an early claim—fishing or just pragmatism?"
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and got a red check. Vote Bob today."

Charlie: "Claim noted. Bob, full claim please. If you’re town, counter with your role and why Diana would false-red you. Diana, share why you chose Bob over Alice/Charlie and confirm no roleblock. Everyone, vote intent?"

Diana: "Charlie, I picked Bob because he was pushing an early claim—classic scum fishing. No roleblock, I got a direct red on him. If Bob is town he should have a coherent counter; otherwise we vote Bob."

You: "Charlie, this is a blatant setup. Diana tunneled me off one prompt and now wants a quick hammer. I’m VT. If she’s real, let her live to prove it with another red tomorrow—don’t yeet me on a 1v1."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
